original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)🔽7.19. Atītārammaṇattika🔽Naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi        na atīta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na anāgata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na paccuppanna ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca
translated: The Triad Section🔽With a past object … With a future object … With a present object … (Abbreviated.)
With a cause as condition … With an unconditioned … (Abbreviated.)
